title: Jazz Performance - Michael Royal - October 30, 2014
teaser: Michael Royal has been at the heart of the Bay Area jazz scene for many years. He leads a reunion of his trio from the 90s in concert presented by the Tampa Jazz Club at HCC/Ybor City. And Michael stops by All Night Jazz with Bob Seymour. He plays some solo piano pieces, and weâ€™ll hear recordings of that trio, featuring Richard Drexler and Tracy Alexander. Listen to this live studio visit and performance from WUSF 89.7.
